text.0: the child when blended with the streams speeding the plan of sacrifice.
text.1: surpasses all things that are dear yea from of old.
text.2: the place near the two pressingstones of trita hath he occupied.
text.3: secret and dear through seven lights of sacrifice.
text.4: urge to three courses on the heights of trita riches in a stream.
text.5: he who is passing wise measures his courses out.
text.6: even at his birth the mothers seven taught him for glory like a sage.
text.7: so that he firm and sure hath set his mind on wealth.
text.8: under his sway of one accord are all the guileless deities.
text.9: warriors to be envied they when they are pleased.
text.10: the babe whom they who strengthen law have generated fair to see.
text.11: much longed for at the sacrifice most liberal sage.
text.12: to him united of themselves come the young parents of the rite.
text.13: when they adorn him duly weaving sacrifice.
text.14: with wisdom and with radiant eyes unbar to us the stall of heaven.
text.15: speeding at solemn rite the plan of holy law.
